means: 耀武扬威地，得意扬扬地

sentence.Network_cn: “我也是这样认为的，”埃维莉娜得意地说。
“她还活着!”他欢欣鼓舞地大声叫道。

sentence.Network_en: They marched triumphantly into the capital.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们怀着胜利的喜悦列队进入首都。

entry.tran: (成功或获胜后)欢欣鼓舞的，狂喜的
entry.def: Someone who is triumphant has gained a victory or succeeded in something and feels very happy about it.

example.ex: Duncan and his triumphant soldiers celebrate their military victory…
example.tran: 邓肯和他那些欢欣鼓舞的士兵们庆祝他们取得了军事胜利。
上校的声音听上去万分得意。

sentences.cn: 狮子正在发出胜利的吼叫。

sentences.en: Robert was looking at me triumphantly.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特正得意扬扬地看着我。
